About Welcome to Riple! Where making a difference is only one Riple away. Start by creating a Drop, the start of every Riple. Then watch your Riple spread as others share and complete your Drop. You can also make an impact by completing and sharing others Drops, just add them to your "Drop" list and complete them as you encounter friends, family and strangers. Remember, the smallest drop can create a Riple! Settings

Talking to yourself again, I see... We could send this, but do you really want to receive it? If a message is received by the same person that sent it, did the message really happen at all? We will send this if you promise not to receive it Still talking to yourself? Go make some Riples, it\'s way more fun than talking to yourself I am sure there are some people on here that would love to talk to you, try messaging them We are going to pretend we don\'t see these Ok ok! We\'ll send it!...You may or may not receive it. You certainly are persistent! This is where your todo Drops will be displayed. Add Drops to this list to get started! This is where conversations with your friends will show up. Start making friends! This user has not created or completed any Drops yet. Nobody has commented on this Drop yet. Have something to say? Nobody has completed this Drop yet. Why don\'t you be the first? Please upload a picture and set your display name first, don\'t be shy :) Please upload a picture first, don\'t be shy :) Please set your display name first, don\'t be shy :) kevinhodgesriple@gmail.com Created by Kevin Hodges Please rotate and crop your picture to your liking... Edit your display name Share a little about yourself Network connection established! Riple is a place of good. A community whose members strive to make the world a better place. In the event that your account contains spam or offensive/inappropriate material, you will be reported and your account will be removed. Thanks for following the rules! This is your Riple headquarters. All of your created and completed Drops will be listed here. You will be given a rank based on how many Riples you have created. Nobody likes a showoff, but it certainly does feel good to see the impact you have made. You may pull to refresh this and all other tabs when you are ready to see new information. This is your friends list. Everyone you have contacted will automatically show up here so you can easily keep in touch. You may also long press your friends cards for additional actions. This is the Trickle. A steady flow of Drops where every Riple begins. Find a Drop you want to complete and add it to your To-Do list. Once there, you may complete it at your leisure. Please, do your part and report spam or inappropriate/offensive material here. This is your Drops list. Your very own To-Do list of Drops. Once added to this list, challenge yourself to complete them as you go about your day. Once complete, the author of the Drop will receive a Riple, and you will have helped make the world a better place. This is where you can get a better look at a Drop and post comments. You can even swipe to the right to see who has completed this Drop. Here, you can view other users Riple activity. View all the Drops they have created and completed. Feel free to send them a message as well. Here, you can post a Drop for everyone to see. A Drop is an idea you have to make the world a better place. No matter how big or small your Drop is, you can create huge Riples. Post your Drop and then watch the Riples spread. Edit your display name Edit your location
